name: Leap In The Right Direction
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey with 'Leap In The Right Direction,' a 2D platformer featuring the friendliest of frogs! Test your skills through the challenging level filled with tricky jumps and cunning obstacles. Navigate the vibrant world, overcome frustrations, and leap your way to victory. With precision and determination, this game offers a visually captivating experience, challenging both your reflexes and patience. Are you ready to take the leap?
